SEARCH
Package HMS.Manager

Class ReplenishManager

java.lang.Object
HMS.Manager.ReplenishManager
public class ReplenishManager extends Object
Manages replenishment requests for medications, including loading, saving, and updating requests.

    • addOrUpdateReplenishment

      public static void addOrUpdateReplenishment(ReplenishmentRequest replenishmentRequest)
      Adds or updates a replenishment request in the list and saves it.
      Parameters:
      replenishmentRequest - the replenishment request to add or update

    • findRequestById

      public static ReplenishmentRequest findRequestById(String requestID)
      Finds a replenishment request by ID.
      Parameters:
      requestID - the ID of the replenishment request to find
      Returns:
      the found ReplenishmentRequest object, or null if no request is found

    • updateReplenishmentStatus

      public static void updateReplenishmentStatus(String requestID, String medicationName, String status)
      Updates the status of a replenishment request.
      Parameters:
      requestID - the ID of the request to update
      medicationName - the name of the medication for logging purposes
      status - the new status to set for the request

    • getReplenishmentRequests

      public static List<ReplenishmentRequest> getReplenishmentRequests()
      Retrieves all current replenishment requests.
      Returns:
      a list of all replenishment requests

    • replenishMedicationStock

      public static boolean replenishMedicationStock(String medicationName, int quantity, List<Staff> staffList)
      Replenishes the stock level of a specified medication, if possible.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication to replenish
      quantity - the quantity to add to the medication's stock
      staffList - the list of staff members, used to locate pharmacists
      Returns:
      true if the stock was successfully replenished, false otherwise
